trans-unit.source: Represents a tabular data source view on XML data for an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> 控制項之 XML 資料的表格式資料來源檢視。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項可以呈現其基礎資料繫結至它的 Web 伺服器控制項的表格式和階層式格式。

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: 這類控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>繫結至 XML 資料，並加以呈現在清單或表格式表單中，而控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>、 繫結至 XML 資料，並以階層形式呈現.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>建立每種檢視類型，在內部執行不同的程式碼路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is created.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>類別提供給 Web 伺服器控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>和繫結至清單和表格式資料，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView>係衍生自的 Web 伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>並繫結至階層式資料。

trans-unit.source: Internally, all data-bound control methods call the `Select` method on whichever data source view object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，資料繫結控制項的所有方法都呼叫`Select`方法會傳回任何資料來源檢視物件。

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> helper objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 如同所有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>協助程式物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>定義資料來源可以使用基礎資料執行的作業。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support update, insert, or delete operations.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>類別只覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法]、 [相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項不支援更新、 插入或刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is sealed, you cannot extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class to add this functionality, but you can derive a data source control from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> and a view from <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> if you require additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>密封的類別，您無法擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>類別加入這項功能，但您也可以衍生的資料來源控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>和檢視從<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>如果您需要額外的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView" /> is associated with.

Initializes a new named instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView" /> class, and associates the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> with it.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView" /> 類別的新具名執行個體，並使其與指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 物件，用於針對基本資料擷取以外的資料要求作業。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of data rows from the underlying XML.
trans-unit.target: 從基礎 XML 中擷取資料列的清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> collection of data items.
trans-unit.target: 資料項目的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 集合。
